word:
"THE BEAUTY OF THIS CHARACTER MADE ITS IMPRESSION UPON AN AGE NOTORIOUS FOR ITS VICE. IT EXTORTED UNWILLING PRAISES FROM THE ENEMIES OF 


                       -37- 

CHRISTIANITY. A CELEBRATED HEATHEN ORATOR EXCLAIMED, "WHAT WIVES THESE CHRISTIANS HAVE!" "A NOBLE TESTIMONY," SAYS A WRITER OF NOTE, "TO THE REFINING POWER OF WOMAN, AND THE MOST BEAUTIFUL TRIBUTE TO THE GENTLE, PERSUASIVE INFLUENCE OF HER PIETY WHICH ALL INIQUITY, HEATHEN OR CHRISTIAN, FURNISHES."
